snippet: The Patriots’ coach said he thought his team had a better shot of rallying by allowing the Giants’ Ahmad Bradshaw to run the ball into the end zone with 57 seconds left.
lead_paragraph: The Patriots’ coach said he thought his team had a better shot of rallying by allowing the Giants’ Ahmad Bradshaw to run the ball into the end zone with 57 seconds left.

headline.seo: Super Bowl — Belichick Has No Regrets on Winning Score
headline.main: Belichick Has No Regrets on Winning Score
headline.print_headline: Belichick Has No Regrets on Winning Score
